description: Hair Texture: Kinky Straight Human Hair Bundles.Material: 100% Unprocessed Brazilian Human Hair.Human Hair Type: Brazilian Remy Human Hair. Weave Hair Human Bundles.Color: Natural Black ColorUnit Weight: 3 Bundles ，95-100g/piece.Hair Weft: Machine Double Wefts.Can Be Permed: Yes,But Please Be Careful Not to Exceed 125°F ! Otherwise it Will Damage The Hair !Hair Smell: It May Have Local Shampoo Smell, but It Will Disappear Fast After Co-Wash, Don'T Worry.How To Take Care Of The Hair?1. Wash The Hair Regularly.2. Detangle Hair Gently Before Washing. Do Not Rub or Twist It.3. Add Mild Shampoo To Cool Water and Swish Hair Till Clean. Rinse Thoroughly.4. Blot Out Excess Water With Towel and Allow Hair to Dry Naturally. Do Not Expose to The Sun.5. Comb Hair Gently With Wide Toothed Comb or With Your Fingers . 6. Brush Straighter Hair in a Downward Motion Straight With The Ends. FAQ:Q1: Will It Shedding?A1: For New Hair, A Few Strands of Hair Initial Shedding is Normal Like Our Own Hair. The Hair is Double Machine Weft to Avoid Shedding.Hair Shedding Can Be Caused by Many Things. Heat Damage From Blow-Dryers, Curling Irons, And Flatirons, As Well As Coloring Will Result in Breakage.Q2: Return/Refund Policy?A2: You Can Return to us if You or Your Family Doesnt Like Our Hair .But Don'T Break The Package.
